free_text.Content: Typical program includes (CF. attachment):[br/][li]State of the art on thin film PV and market situation[br/][li]Deposition techniques[br/][li]Thin film silicon[br/][li]Amorphous and micro or nano silicon materials[br/][li]Photovoltaic devices[br/][li]Back end; Encapsulation and testing[br/][li]TCO and light trapping[br/][li]Tandem solar cells[br/][li]Series interconnection, lasering[br/][li]Cell design and diagnostic[br/][li]Characterisation methods (spectroscopy, electrical measurements, shunts analysis...)[br/][li]Photovoltaic installations[br/]
free_text.Keywords: Photovoltaic, thin film, silicon, CVD, encapsulation, diagnostic tools
free_text.Note: This course is organised for industrial partners and 4-5 places are opened to PhD students in the field of photovoltaics
